title: 153. How To Grow a Business in a Down Economy  Barcelona Wine Bar
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Adam Halberg, the chief executive officer of Barcelona Wine Bar, to explore how businesses in the restaurant and hospitality industry could use the economic downturn as an opportunity to increase brand awareness.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
